body.raw:
{
	"name": "All-Esps-AB-Winner Unique Open using Message with System Field, Date Function, List Field Ocx Operator",
	"type": "split",
	"list_id": {{list_id}}, 
    "split_type": "email",
    "email_message": [ {{msg_id_ab_winner_system_field_mearg_operator}},{{all_esp_ab_winner_common_message}} ],
    "segments": [ "{{all_esp_segment_id_ab_winner_list_system_date}}" ],
    "distribution": [
    	{
            "esp_connection_id":{{connectionId}},
            "percent":"100"
    	}
    ],
    "schedule_date": {{time_30}},
    "notify_onlaunch": "0",
    "notify_onfaile d": "0",
    "notify_oncomplete": "0",
	"has_winner_settings":true,
	"winner_is_quota_percent":"0",
	"winner_quota_value":"1",
	"winner_conversion_field":"unique_opens",
	"winner_send_after_hours":"1"
}
